Package com.company

Class Main

java.lang.Object
com.company.Main
public class Main
extends java.lang.Object
this is main class in this class we creat objects from MusicCollection communicate with user to make decision what to do
Since:
2020-10-19

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Main()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void addMusic()
    if user choose (add music) we call this function get the information of a music and add it to the related category collection
    static void addToFavorite()
    if user choose (add to favorite) we call this function get the category and index of a music and add it to favorite list
    static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)  
    static void play()
    if user choose (play) we call this function get the category and index of a music and play it
    static void printMenu()
    print the menu of items
    static void removeFromFavorite()
    if user choose (remove from favorite) we call this function get the category and index of a music and remove it from favorite list
    static void search()
    if user choose (search) we call this function get a string from user and search it among all files
    static void showMusic()
    if user choose (show file of a music) we call this function get the category and index of a music and show its details
    static void showMusics()
    if user choose (show the list of musics) we call this function show all musics indifferent categories
    static void stop()
    if user choose (stop) we call this function get the category and index of a music and stop it

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
